title: Sentinal插件崩服问题
author: Enderthink
txt_content:
我想问一下为什么Sentinal插件设定好的哨兵攻击怪物或玩家以后会造成服务器崩溃?
这该如何解决呢？以下是服务器报错信息
[18:54:44 ERROR]: The server has stopped responding!
[18:54:44 ERROR]: Please report this to PaperSpigot directly!
[18:54:44 ERROR]: Be sure to include ALL relevant console errors and Minecraft crash reports
[18:54:44 ERROR]: PaperSpigot version: git-PaperSpigot-"4c7641d" (MC: 1.8.8)
[18:54:44 ERROR]: ------------------------------
[18:54:44 ERROR]: Server thread dump (Look for plugins here before reporting to PaperSpigot!):
[18:54:44 ERROR]: ------------------------------
[18:54:44 ERROR]: Current Thread: Server thread
[18:54:44 ERROR]:       PID: 15 | Suspended: false | Native: false | State: RUNNABLE
[18:54:44 ERROR]:       Stack:
[18:54:44 ERROR]:               net.minecraft.server.v1_8_R3.Block.b(Block.java:228)
[18:54:44 ERROR]:               net.citizensnpcs.nms.v1_8_R3.util.PlayerPathfinderNormal.a(PlayerPathfinderNormal.java:195)
[18:54:44 ERROR]:               net.citizensnpcs.nms.v1_8_R3.util.PlayerPathfinderNormal.a(PlayerPathfinderNormal.java:61)
[18:54:44 ERROR]:       PID: 30 | Suspended: false | Native: false | State: TIMED_WAITING
[18:54:44 ERROR]:       Stack:
[18:54:44 ERROR]:               java.lang.Object.wait(Native Method)
[18:54:44 ERROR]:               java.util.TimerThread.mainLoop(Unknown Source)
[18:54:44 ERROR]:               java.util.TimerThread.run(Unknown Source)
[18:54:44 ERROR]: ------------------------------
2018-09-25 18:54:44,921 ERROR Attempted to append to non-started appender TerminalConsole

replies.author: qiangshuiya
replies.txt_content: 换1.8.3 spigot服务端，你的citiznes插件和服务端不匹配

replies.author: EnTIv
replies.txt_content:
发给作者寻求帮助吧,如果作者不修复只能删掉

满意请给最佳,如有疑问可加Q 1522935501 详细解答

replies.author: Enderthink
replies.txt_content:
qiangshuiya 发表于 2018-9-26 09:51
换1.8.3 spigot服务端，你的citiznes插件和服务端不匹配
那请问如果换了以后会有影响其他插件的风险吗？

replies.author: qiangshuiya
replies.txt_content: 一般不会， citizens插件比较挑服务端，其他插件还好
